description: the course focuses on the creation and development of products, materials, CAD and systems with a strong emphasis on aesthetics, functionality, usability, and user experience.

the course aims to train professionals capable of programming and integrating systems, applications, and services of heterogeneous nature, using modern software development technologies, tools, and methodologies.

the course intends to equip its graduates with the necessary skills to analyze, specify, and develop information systems, install and administer computer networks and implement computer solutions for specific applications.
